titleStmt.title: [Thomas Martin & al. appellants. against William Stephens respondent]... Bewick, Simon Brown, senr. Simon Brown, junr. Robt. Hills, Edward Ballard, Joseph Leach and Thomas Cottage. ... Vicar of Linton. Respondent. The appellants case.
titleStmt.author: Martin, Thomas, fl. 1696.
Stephens, William, fl. 1696.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: title page trimmed at head affecting title. First part of title supplied from Wing.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
